I need to take care of myself first!\\\: I always lose track of time in the Kaleidoscope. If I'm to take care of others
home/meikyude: I need to take care of myself first!\"
home/watashitachi: but I never knew each Star was its own world.\n ...I'll keep them all in my prayers!\"
but... I'm not sure how to go about \\\: \"The Bishop sent me away from the church on a mission

home/oshishosamaga: \"The Bishop once taught me that the greatest prayers are the ones you make for others.\n...Shall we pray for each other?\"
ally/join: my name is Liesel Berger. I pray the Stars smile upon our meeting—and will do my best to spread their Light!\"
ally/evolution: The Stars in all their benevolence have given me the strength to help people... And you have given me the courage. Thank you!
